name: Cafe Moonlight
review: Quiet rooftop cafe with candlelight and live acoustic music. Great for dates.

name: Spice Junction
review: Loud, spicy Indian food. Great for family dinners but not romantic.

name: Urban Beans
review: Trendy modern caf√© with great coffee, cozy booths, soft lighting.

name: Biryani Boss
review: Fast food biryani joint. Crowded and fast-paced, not suitable for sitting long.

name: Love Bistro
review: Intimate place with slow music, fairy lights, and great desserts. Couples all around.
